result.html: phós sí fear saibhirShe married a rich man.
result.ponchtml: ṗós sí fear saiḃirShe married a rich man.

result.eng: The media are owned by the rich.
result.ga: tá na meáin chumarsáide i seilbh lucht an rachmais

result.eng: I don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
